title: Funding opportunity: UKRI Gambling Harms Research Coordination Centre (GHRCC)
description: Apply for funding to coordinate and facilitate activity in the field of gambling harms research as part of UK Research and Innovation (UKRI)â€™s Research Programme on Gambling (RPG).
